TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlElementEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class HtmlElementEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 上定义的事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the events defined on and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装在上找到的相同信息`window.event`对象在对非托管 HTML DOM 编程时或在 HTML 页的写入活动脚本时。 encapsulates the same information found on the `window.event` object when programming against the unmanaged HTML DOM or when writing Active Script for HTML pages. 在大多数情况下，你可以使用来查找正在接收事件操作的 HTML 元素和来查找当前事件使我们离开的 HTML 元素。In most cases, you can use to find the HTML element that is receiving the event action, and to find the HTML element that the current event is causing us to leave. 但是，并非每个事件提供这些属性; 的值请参阅事件，托管的文档或 Internet 资源管理器 SDK 文档，以了解事件提供该中的相应文档。However, not every event supplies a value for these properties; see the managed documentation for an event, or the corresponding documentation in the Internet Explorer SDK documentation, to discover if the event supplies it. HTML DOM 中的许多事件会发送到其父元素，除非它们将被取消。Many events in the HTML DOM are sent to their parent elements unless they are cancelled. 这称为事件上传。This is known as event bubbling. 如果`SPAN`内`DIV`接收到单击，然后为引发单击事件`SPAN`第一个，然后针对`DIV`，最后的 HTML 页面`BODY`元素。If a `SPAN` inside of a `DIV` receives a click, then a click event is raised for the `SPAN` first, then for the `DIV`, and finally for the HTML page's `BODY` element. 控制事件将或不以这种方式进行行为。 controls whether an event will behave in this manner or not. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

summary.span: 指示此事件发生时是否按下了 Alt 键。

span.span: Indicates whether the ALT key was pressed when this event occurred.

value.span: 如果曾按下 Alt 键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: is the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BubbleEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BubbleEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前事件是否以冒泡方式通过 HTML 文档对象模型的元素层次结构。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current event bubbles up through the element hierarchy of the HTML Document Object Model.

value.span: 如果事件冒泡，则为 ；如果事件不冒泡，则为 。

span.span: if the event bubbles; if it does not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在文档对象模型气泡的不是所有事件。Not all events in the Document Object Model bubble. 所有公开的事件托管包装气泡除外。All of the events exposed by the managed wrapper bubble with the exception of . 有关、`Error`和`Load`事件并不会向上冒泡。For , the `Error` and `Load` events do not bubble. 设置`BubbleEvent`到`true`任何这些事件将产生任何影响。Setting `BubbleEvent` to `true` during any of these events will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlDocument1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlDocument1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#422)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#422](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#422)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientMousePosition As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point ClientMousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标指针在文档工作区中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor in the document's client area.
The current position of the mouse cursor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ClientMousePosition` 提供相关文档的左上角的光标的鼠标位置。`ClientMousePosition` gives the mouse position of the cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 使用如果您需要相对于引发事件的元素的鼠标坐标。Use if you need the mouse coordinates relative to the element that raised the event. ## Examples 下面的 HTML 文件演示相对定位的`TABLE`内`BODY`标记。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text More text
``` 下面的代码示例显示之间的差， ，和当用户单击的元素`TABLE`。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 将显示相对于文档的客户端区域的左上角的坐标。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 将显示相对于窗口左上角的坐标`TABLE`。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果你单击其中一个的文本，行将显示相对于的坐标`TD`元素。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 此示例需要您已配置了`Document_MouseDown`为处理程序上的事件。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置鼠标光标相对于相对定位的父元素的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to a relatively positioned parent element.

value.span: 如果父元素相对定位，则鼠标光标的位置相对于引发事件的元素的父元素的左上角。

span.span: The position of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the parent of the element that raised the event, if the parent element is relatively positioned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 相对定位用于在 HTML 中相对于其父级在页面上放置一个元素。Relative positioning is used in HTML to place an element on a page in relation to its parent. 如果元素为相对定位，此属性将返回与相同的结果。If an element is relatively positioned, this property will return the same result as . ## Examples 下面的 HTML 文件演示相对定位的`TABLE`内`BODY`标记。The following HTML file demonstrates relative positioning of a `TABLE` inside of a `BODY` tag. ```
Text/TD> More text
``` 下面的代码示例显示之间的差， ，和当用户单击的元素`TABLE`。The following code example displays the difference between , , and when the user clicks on an element of the `TABLE`. 将显示相对于文档的客户端区域的左上角的坐标。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the document's client area. 将显示相对于窗口左上角的坐标`TABLE`。 will display coordinates relative to the upper-left corner of the `TABLE`. 如果你单击其中一个的文本，行将显示相对于的坐标`TD`元素。If you click on one of the lines of text, will display coordinates relative to that `TD` element. 此示例需要您已配置了`Document_MouseDown`为处理程序上的事件。This example requires that you have configured `Document_MouseDown` as a handler for the event on .
